task: show me all  medium alert of last week.  use --json to avoid parsing errors. Make sure I have human friendly markdown block with complete command

steps.input: Find information relevant to this task: show me all  medium alert of last week.  use --json to avoid parsing errors. Make sure I have human friendly markdown block with complete command . Return only the most relevant information from the Lacework CLI documentation.
steps.output:
To list all medium alerts from the last week using the Lacework CLI, you can use the following command:

```bash
lacework alert ls --severity medium --range "last 7 days" --json
```

This command filters alerts by medium severity and sets the timeframe to the last 7 days, while using the `--json` flag to ensure the output is in JSON format.
